mode.title: Scraping Mode
mode.description: Choose how to provide search queries

keywords.title: Keywords
keywords.description: Search keywords (e.g., 'restaurants', 'coffee shops'). One per line.

locations.title: Locations
locations.description: Locations to search (zip codes, cities, or addresses). One per line.

urls.title: Google Maps URLs
urls.description: Google Maps search or business URLs. One per line.

maxResultsPerQuery.title: Max Results Per Query
maxResultsPerQuery.description: Maximum number of businesses to scrape per query (1-120)

useApifyProxy.title: Use Apify Proxy
useApifyProxy.description: Use Apify's proxy service (recommended, additional cost applies)

proxyConfiguration.title: Apify Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Apify proxy settings (only if 'Use Apify Proxy' is enabled)

customProxies.title: Custom Proxies
customProxies.description: Your own proxies in format IP:PORT:USERNAME:PASSWORD (only if 'Use Apify Proxy' is disabled)

rotationThreshold.title: Proxy Rotation Threshold
rotationThreshold.description: Rotate proxy after N requests (only for custom proxies)

headless.title: Headless Mode
headless.description: Run browser in headless mode (recommended for production)

extractEmails.title: Extract Emails
extractEmails.description: Extract email addresses from business websites (slower but more data)
